name: RACHIT SHARMA
career_objective: Level 2 IT Helpdesk professional with strong experience supporting Microsoft-based environments across MSP, healthcare, education, and regulated enterprise settings. Skilled in troubleshooting complex incidents, supporting cloud and on-prem infrastructure, and delivering reliable, client-focused IT services. Brings hands-on exposure to Microsoft 365, Azure fundamentals, Windows Server, networking, and endpoint security. Seeking to contribute as a capable L2 technician within a growing regional MSP delivering high-quality managed IT services.

experience.role_line: ICT Service Desk Specialist (L2) | Melbourne, VIC | Nov 2024 – Present

Administer Active Directory and Microsoft 365 user access, group policies, and device configurations.
Provide onsite and remote support for complex technical issues requiring advanced troubleshooting.
Support patching, endpoint compliance, and basic security controls in line with organisational policies.
Maintain high-quality documentation and contribute to knowledge base improvements.

experience.role_line: IT Support Analyst (L1/L2) | Melbourne, VIC | Dec 2023 – Nov 2024
bullets: Delivered L2 support across Microsoft 365, Windows Server-based services, and networked environments.
Troubleshot connectivity issues involving DNS, DHCP, VPN access, and firewall-related faults.
Assisted with infrastructure refreshes, hardware deployments, and system upgrades.
Worked closely with senior engineers to resolve complex incidents and infrastructure issues.
Supported client onboarding activities and maintained accurate ITSM documentation.

Worked within ITSM workflows to manage incidents and service requests.

body_points: Proven experience delivering Level 1 and Level 2 IT support in regulated healthcare and enterprise environments.
Hands-on support across Microsoft 365, Active Directory, Intune-managed endpoints, and Windows systems.
